title: Point of the stick
creator_credit: M Thompson, William Orr and Visnews Productions
brief_description: The overall objective is to illuminate the famed art of Sir Adrian Boult’s technique of conducting, in a fresh and personal way for each viewer. The film features Sir Adrian Boult conducting the London Philharmonic Orchestra with Moura Lympany (piano) and John Carol Case (baritone). Features the music of Beethoven, Handel, Mozart and Brahms.
